page.title: 13Life at Holmes Church.
page.content: The Church and Sunday School are used for a lot of things. On Sunday morning chapel starts at half past ten. Usually there are five hymns and one of the children from the Bible. After the collection the children go into Sunday School where they sing choruses and have classes. At 2pm there is Sunday School again, 5.50pm Prayer Meeting 6.30pm Evening Service. In Winter on Tuesdays there is a Guild at 7.30pm. On Fridays at 7pm there is a Youth Club. A few weeks ago we had a Walking Day joining with Merebrow. The little ones ride on a decorated trailer with Bible Texts on it. The older ones walk behind the Banner and Band. Other events happend during the year :- New Year Day Celebrations, Hot Pot Suppers, Bible Studies, Harvest, Events for Missionaries visits.
